alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 12 at 12:06AM CST until December 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds of 25-35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph, shifting to the northwest after 5 PM. * WHERE...In New Mexico: Hidalgo, Luna, Dona Ana, Sierra, and portions of Grant and Otero Counties. In far west Texas: Hudspeth and El Paso Counties. * WHEN...Late Monday morning through Monday night. * IMPACTS...Loose objects and holiday decorations may be lofted and damaged. Travel will be difficult along N/S highways, especially for high-profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will focus along east slopes of area mountains during the mid-afternoon hours.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that winds of 30 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
